snippet: The festival, which has become the alt-classical world’s main showcase, will offer 11 concerts, with new works by several young composers.
abstract: The festival, which has become the alt-classical world’s main showcase, will offer 11 concerts, with new works by several young composers.

headline.main: Raft of New Works Scheduled for Ecstatic Music Festival
headline.print_headline: Raft of New Works At Ecstatic Music Festival
